Class powerup

  • java.lang.Object
    • TC.powerup

  • public class powerup
extends java.lang.Object
    Defeated enemies will drop powerups at random times and the player can pick these up to gain an extra superpower.
    Version:
    3/5/15
    Author:
    UCSB-CS48-W15-G08
